attributes.action: Conscription for repeat offenders & those convicted of gang association
attributes.additional_details:
Conscription brings order and discipline to those who might not have been fortunate enough to have grown up in a stable home environment where discipline and respect is taught and learned.

The military is a large family where an individual is taught to respect others and in the process learns self respect.  To be part of a team.

Through the military a person can learn skills and trades that could benefit the individual as well as make a positive contribution to society.
